words.definition: If something is abnormal, it is strange or not normal.
words.example: Her idea of art is a bit too abnormal for me.

words.definition: Bamboo is a hard plant with thin branches and leaves.
words.example: Outside his home, there is a lot of bamboo.

words.definition: A blossom is a flower or group of flowers.
words.example: There were colorful blossoms in the yard.

words.definition: A compass is a device used to tell what direction one is going.
words.example: A compass is an important tool to have when you are traveling.

words.definition: A dialect is a regional variety of language showing where you are from.
words.example: The people in this village speak a different dialect.

words.definition: If someone is dishonest, they do not tell the truth.
words.example: She Gs was being dishonest when she said she didn't eat the cake.

words.definition: A dwarf is a person, animal, or plant that is much smaller than normal.
words.example: The GS dwarf stood next to the tall tree.

words.definition: An ecosystem is a group of plants and animals that live together in the same area.
words.example: The GS rain forest is a diverse ecosystem.

words.definition: If something is fatal, it causes death.
words.example: The GS car accident was fatal.

words.definition: If you are impatient, you are not able to wait for something without getting upset.
words.example: He GS became impatient when the bus was late.

words.definition: A leaf is the flat, green part of a plant or tree.
words.example: The GS leaf fell from the tree.

words.definition: A manuscript is an old document that was written by hand.
words.example: The GS museum has many ancient manuscripts.

words.definition: A marsh is a type of wet land with low grass.
words.example: The GS birds lived in the marsh.

words.definition: Patience is the ability to wait for something without getting upset.
words.example: You GS need a lot of patience to teach children.

words.definition: Perfume is a liquid that has a pleasant smell.
words.example: She GS put on some perfume before the party.

words.definition: A pond is a small area of water that is smaller than a lake.
words.example: The GS ducks were swimming in the pond.

words.definition: A proverb is a short, well-known saying that gives advice.
words.example: He GS quoted a famous proverb.

words.definition: A pursuit is the act of chasing or following something.
words.example: The GS police were in pursuit of the criminal.

words.definition: To recite something is to say it aloud from memory.
words.example: She GS recited a poem for the class.

words.definition: A wilderness is an area of land where there are no people living.
words.example: They Gs went hiking in the wilderness.
